author: Special Correspondent
text:
LPG consumer meet tomorrow

A meeting to hear grievances of LPG consumers will be conducted at the Collector’s office here at 4 p.m. on Monday, February 29.

LPG consumers can get their grievances redressed at the meeting, to be chaired by the District Revenue Officer, according to a press release from V. Rajaraman, Collector.
title: LPG consumer meet
